      • orderIsCompleted

        public java.lang.Boolean orderIsCompleted(java.lang.String startDate,
                                          java.lang.String endDate,
                                          java.lang.String renterName,
                                          java.lang.String renterPhoneNumber)
        Description copied from interface: GroupInterface
        Checks if all the dates in the active order are available for rent in the said period. If they are the order will be added to the onGoing orders list. Else it will return false.
        Specified by:
        orderIsCompleted in interface GroupInterface
        Parameters:
        startDate - start date of when you want to make the order.
        endDate - end date of when you want to make the order.
        renterName - name of the renter of the order.
        renterPhoneNumber - phone number of the renter.
        Returns:
        true if it worked, false if it did not work.
